p: In our case, the position of a point defect is set by a radius vector r 0 = n T/2, where n is the internal normal to the input crystal surface, Z = 0. Note, the crystal thickness T of a single crystal Si(111) is chosen such that the X-ray absorption in a sample can be neglected. In the first study stage, one needs to checkup that the SA algorithm code can be effective in the case of one XRDT 2D projection when only the term with Φ = 0 is taken into account in formula ( 12).
